enhanced_by.reason: Ensures that the child nodes list is initialized before inserting new children.
Notifies the element that the node list has changed, which is crucial for maintaining internal state consistency.
Both methods involve manipulating and accessing the list of child elements, making assertions about the state of child elements more relevant.
The method 'children()' returns the child elements of the current element, which can be used to verify the correctness of the insertion operation.
